4.eng-name: The Book on the Day of Friday
4.ara-name: كِتَاب الْجُمُعَةِ عَنْ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:the Prophet said: "The best day that the sun has risen upon is Friday. On it Adam was created, on it he entered Paradise, and on it, he was expelled from it. And the Hour will not be established except on Friday

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Virtue Of The Day Of Jumu'ah
